Name: Satan's Whiskers (Straight)
Ingredients: 10 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry and citrusy with underlying piney gin and herbal complexity.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . A variation on the classic Bronx .
Nutrition: One serving of Satan's Whiskers (Straight) contains 132 calories
